name: Plash Digital Labs
overview:
Plash is a personalized news aggregator delivering the latest news and information from thousands of newspapers, blogs, and magazines. It brings multiple sources together at one place, and formats them for easy reading on mobile devices giving the user a beautifully crafted experience that puts content at its heart. Plash takes an approach to personalized content discovery with sophisticated technology and proprietary algorithms. The semantic analysis technology behind Plash allows the user to personalize news based on his specific interests from traditional as well alternate sources. Plash! is a one stop platform to discover great content presented in visually appealing and beautiful format with easy means to monetize these content on Mobile devices.

At Plash, we have assembled a team of people with deep experience in the underlying technologies and business areas that are needed to deliver our vision: Business incubation and venture capital, product development, enterprise architecture, content curation and user experience among other key capabilities. The founders of Plash have worked previously at Microsoft, Mind Tree and Capillary Technologies. With a current team size of seven, Plash is based in the IT heartland of India, Bangalore and is currently funded by group of angel investors.
